Text: Nice print uploader. V9 A9. Hope u bring more of such releases... :)

the language spoken is  Hindi not English... so unless you speak and understand Hindi, don't make the mistake I made and download this torrent as you will be just as disappointed as I was.  again this is in HINDI HINDI HINDI>>>>>>>>>>

stressed out that this is in HINDI, but figured out something, might help, to change the languange they speak to english, (VLC media player) right click when the movie's playing, audio, audio track, choose the ENG one...
